content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: RDEVID
      operator: non_empty
    - name: RSUBJID
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000234
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Verify that RSUBJID is empty when RDEVID is populated
Outcome:
  Message: RSUBJID must be missing when RDEVID is populated
  Output Variables:
    - RDEVID
    - RSUBJID
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0366
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Associated Persons (AP) are persons other than study
                  subjects who can be associated with a study, a particular study
                  subject, or a device used in the study.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: ' '
                Section: Associated Persons
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - AP--

json.Description: Verify that RSUBJID is empty when RDEVID is populated

Outcome.Message: RSUBJID must be missing when RDEVID is populated

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Associated Persons (AP) are persons other than study subjects who can be associated with a study, a particular study subject, or a device used in the study.
